name: University of Oxford CPD Electronics, Telecoms and LTE
tag_list: education, training, professional-development, lte, telecoms, engineering, electronics
overview:
Internationally recognised high quality training for professionals at the cutting edge of the global electronics, telecoms and engineering industries.

For electronics designers, hardware designers, engineers and scientists, EMC specialists, RF engineers, PCB specialists, production and sales staff, technical managers, telecoms engineers and related staff, systems engineers, field application engineers, executives, standardization and software architects, consultants, business planners, analysts and account managers from the electronics, telecoms and engineering industry.

Professional development courses taught by leading researchers and industry experts. Participants gain insights into the very latest advances in knowledge, skills and techniques and take advantage of networking opportunities.
